title: George and Amal Clooney donate $500,000 to Parkland Students’ March for Our Lives

meta_data.description: George and Amal Clooney will donate $500,000 to the March for Our Lives, a demonstration to advocate for gun control in the wake of Wednesday’s tragic shooting at a high school in Parkland, Fla. The Clooneys will also participate in the event, which will take place in Washington, D.C. and throughout the U.S. “Amal and […]
